articles.author: Helen Collis
articles.title: EU regulator: mRNA coronavirus vaccines possibly linked to heart swelling - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The regulator’s safety committee analyzed 145 cases of myocarditis and 138 cases of pericarditis after the BioNTech/Pfizer vaccine.
articles.content: The mRNA vaccines from BioNTech/Pfizer and Moderna are possibly linked to rare cases of heart inflammation, according to analysis of 321 cases post-vaccination released Friday by the European Medicin… [+2115 chars]

articles.title: EU regulator finds link between heart inflammation and mRNA COVID vaccines - Financial Post
articles.description: Europe’s drug regulator has found a possible link between rare heart inflammation and COVID-19 vaccines from Pfizer and Moderna, and advised people with a…
articles.content: Europes drug regulator has found a possible link between rare heart inflammation and COVID-19 vaccines from Pfizer and Moderna, and advised people with a history of a rare blood disorder to avoid get… [+897 chars]

articles.author: Deirdre O'Donnell
articles.title: OPPO designs what might be its take on the Android gaming phone - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: OPPO has registered schematics for a new phone with the European Union's Intellectual Property Office (EUIPO). It looks a lot like one of the new Reno6 series - except for the new chassis that seems intended to come across as much more "gamer" than the existi…
articles.content: OPPO has recently updated its Reno smartphones with the latest 6 series. Now, it seems the OEM is working on a new variant for the line - albeit one with a very different rear panel than usual. Accor… [+846 chars]

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Soccer-England face disciplinary probe over laser pen shone at Schmeichel - CNA
articles.description: European football's governing body UEFA opened disciplinary proceedings against England on Thursday over a laser pen shone at Denmark goalkeeper Kasper Schmeichel during the deciding moment of their Euro 2020 semi-final.
articles.content: REUTERS: European football's governing body UEFA opened disciplinary proceedings against England on Thursday over a laser pen shone at Denmark goalkeeper Kasper Schmeichel during the deciding moment … [+1126 chars]
